meta.title: Institutional Regeneration Framework - Global Governance Framework
meta.description: A comprehensive framework for transforming international organizations toward agility, inclusion, and effectiveness through voluntary, incentive-driven evolution.

guideCard.title: Begin Your Institution's Regeneration
guideCard.description: Start with our Executive Summary to understand the challenge, then explore the Regeneration Compact to begin your transformation journey.

stakeholderTool.description: Interactive tool to map your institution's political landscape and identify supporters, resistors, and influence patterns for regeneration planning.

executiveSummary.description: Comprehensive overview of the challenge, solution, and implementation strategy for institutional transformation.
